title: Endings Guide
content:
rain, your goal is to reach the top of it with your party. In this area, you will be battling thralls, the Netherbrain's spawns in an attempt to slow your party. Once you are successful at this battle, the Netherbrain is weakened and will try to tempt you by offering you a choice to join and be The Absolute:

Command the brain to destroy the tadpoles and then itself. Dominate the brain. Become the Absolute. Conquer the world.

This ending can be obtained by making the decision of commanding the
